mapper.insert: insert into t_sf_cons_survey_report_property (ROW_ID, PP_ID, PROPERTY_FORM, STRUCTURE_TYPE, PLAN_AREA, PLAN_AREA_F1, PLAN_AREA_F2, STOREY_HIGH_F1, STOREY_HIGH_F2, UG_LAYER, G_LAYER, BUILDING_HIGHT, STRUCTURE_BEARING, BEARING_F1, BEARING_F2, IS_BASEMENT, LOCATION, BASE_REINFORCE, MOULD_REINFORCE, BEAM_REINFORCE, FLOOR_PUNCH, STRUCTURE_REMOVAL, ADD_STAIRS, ADD_ELEVATOR, SANDWICH_LAYER, OTHER, IS_REFORM, IS_REINFORCE, DESCRIPTION, BUILDING_PLAN, BUILDING_DRAWING, ELEC_PLAN, ELEC_DRAWING, SITE_MEASURE, SITE_PLAN, SITE_DRAWING, WIDTH_F1, DEPTH_F1, WIDTH_F2, DEPTH_F2, BEAM_HEIGHT_F1, BEAM_HEIGHT_F2, FLOORSLAB_HEIGHT_F1, FLOORSLAB_HEIGHT_F2, IS_BLUEPRINT_COPY, IS_UTILITY_DRAWING, OUTER_WALL, INTERIOR_WALL, GROUND, CEILING, EQUIPMENT_DEAL, BUILDING_DESCRIPTION, IS_EXTERNAL_LIGHTING, MATERIAL, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_FLAG ) values (#{rowId}, #{ppId}, #{propertyForm}, #{structureType}, #{planArea}, #{planAreaF1}, #{planAreaF2}, #{storeyHighF1}, #{storeyHighF2}, #{ugLayer}, #{glayer}, #{buildingHight}, #{structureBearing}, #{bearingF1}, #{bearingF2}, #{isBasement}, #{location}, #{baseReinforce}, #{mouldReinforce}, #{beamReinforce}, #{floorPunch}, #{structureRemoval}, #{addStairs}, #{addElevator}, #{sandwichLayer}, #{other}, #{isReform}, #{isReinforce}, #{description}, #{buildingPlan}, #{buildingDrawing}, #{elecPlan}, #{elecDrawing}, #{siteMeasure}, #{sitePlan}, #{siteDrawing}, #{widthF1}, #{depthF1}, #{widthF2}, #{depthF2}, #{beamHeightF1}, #{beamHeightF2}, #{floorslabHeightF1}, #{floorslabHeightF2}, #{isBlueprintCopy}, #{isUtilityDrawing}, #{outerWall}, #{interiorWall}, #{ground}, #{ceiling}, #{equipmentDeal}, #{buildingDescription}, #{isExternalLighting}, #{material}, #{creator}, #{createTime}, #{updater}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: update t_sf_cons_survey_report_property set PROPERTY_FORM = #{propertyForm}, STRUCTURE_TYPE = #{structureType}, PLAN_AREA = #{planArea}, PLAN_AREA_F1 = #{planAreaF1}, PLAN_AREA_F2 = #{planAreaF2}, STOREY_HIGH_F1 = #{storeyHighF1}, STOREY_HIGH_F2 = #{storeyHighF2}, UG_LAYER = #{ugLayer}, G_LAYER = #{glayer}, BUILDING_HIGHT = #{buildingHight}, STRUCTURE_BEARING = #{structureBearing}, BEARING_F1 = #{bearingF1}, BEARING_F2 = #{bearingF2}, IS_BASEMENT = #{isBasement}, LOCATION = #{location}, BASE_REINFORCE = #{baseReinforce}, MOULD_REINFORCE = #{mouldReinforce}, BEAM_REINFORCE = #{beamReinforce}, FLOOR_PUNCH = #{floorPunch}, STRUCTURE_REMOVAL = #{structureRemoval}, ADD_STAIRS = #{addStairs}, ADD_ELEVATOR = #{addElevator}, SANDWICH_LAYER = #{sandwichLayer}, OTHER = #{other}, IS_REFORM = #{isReform}, IS_REINFORCE = #{isReinforce}, DESCRIPTION = #{description}, BUILDING_PLAN = #{buildingPlan}, BUILDING_DRAWING = #{buildingDrawing}, ELEC_PLAN = #{elecPlan}, ELEC_DRAWING = #{elecDrawing}, SITE_MEASURE = #{siteMeasure}, SITE_PLAN = #{sitePlan}, SITE_DRAWING = #{siteDrawing}, WIDTH_F1 = #{widthF1}, DEPTH_F1 = #{depthF1}, WIDTH_F2 = #{widthF2}, DEPTH_F2 = #{depthF2}, BEAM_HEIGHT_F1 = #{beamHeightF1}, BEAM_HEIGHT_F2 = #{beamHeightF2}, FLOORSLAB_HEIGHT_F1 = #{floorslabHeightF1}, FLOORSLAB_HEIGHT_F2 = #{floorslabHeightF2}, IS_BLUEPRINT_COPY = #{isBlueprintCopy}, IS_UTILITY_DRAWING = #{isUtilityDrawing}, OUTER_WALL = #{outerWall}, INTERIOR_WALL = #{interiorWall}, GROUND = #{ground}, CEILING = #{ceiling}, EQUIPMENT_DEAL = #{equipmentDeal}, BUILDING_DESCRIPTION = #{buildingDescription}, IS_EXTERNAL_LIGHTING = #{isExternalLighting}, MATERIAL = #{material}, UPDATER = #{updater}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime} where PP_ID =#{ppId} AND ROW_ID = #{rowId} AND DEL_FLAG = 'M0015'
mapper.select: select ROW_ID, PP_ID, PROPERTY_FORM, STRUCTURE_TYPE, PLAN_AREA, PLAN_AREA_F1, PLAN_AREA_F2, STOREY_HIGH_F1, STOREY_HIGH_F2, UG_LAYER, G_LAYER, BUILDING_HIGHT, STRUCTURE_BEARING, BEARING_F1, BEARING_F2, IS_BASEMENT, LOCATION, BASE_REINFORCE, MOULD_REINFORCE, BEAM_REINFORCE, FLOOR_PUNCH, STRUCTURE_REMOVAL, ADD_STAIRS, ADD_ELEVATOR, SANDWICH_LAYER, OTHER, IS_REFORM, IS_REINFORCE, DESCRIPTION, BUILDING_PLAN, BUILDING_DRAWING, ELEC_PLAN, ELEC_DRAWING, SITE_MEASURE, SITE_PLAN, SITE_DRAWING, WIDTH_F1, DEPTH_F1, WIDTH_F2, DEPTH_F2, BEAM_HEIGHT_F1, BEAM_HEIGHT_F2, FLOORSLAB_HEIGHT_F1, FLOORSLAB_HEIGHT_F2, IS_BLUEPRINT_COPY, IS_UTILITY_DRAWING, OUTER_WALL, INTERIOR_WALL, GROUND, CEILING, EQUIPMENT_DEAL, BUILDING_DESCRIPTION, IS_EXTERNAL_LIGHTING, MATERIAL from t_sf_cons_survey_report_property where PP_ID = #{ppId} AND DEL_FLAG ='M0015'
